summary: The MT mod adds more life and enjoyment to the Ragged-Flagon not only does it just add more NPC's it also adds more thief related trainers.
descriptionHtml:
The MoreThieves mod adds more NPC's and thief skill related trainers to the Ragged-Flagon!
If you decide to join the thieves guild you'll be able to find a special companion waiting for you. (only available if you joined the TG)
If you find anything that needs fixing or any bugs of some sort, contact me either on steam or leave a comment (steam: [73rd] DamiÃ«n)

Location:
Ragged-Flagon and Thief Headquarters
author: DSmidt
